testcase.failure:
Resource: aws_db_instance.healthy File: /database.tf: 36-71 Guideline: https://docs.prismacloud.io/en/enterprise-edition/policy-reference/aws-policies/aws-general-policies/bc-aws-354
36 | resource "aws_db_instance" "healthy" { 37 | identifier = "healthy-db" 38 | allocated_storage = var.db_allocated_storage 39 | engine = "postgres" 40 | engine_version = "15.7" 41 | instance_class = var.db_instance_class 42 | db_name = var.db_name 43 | username = var.db_username 44 | password = var.db_password 45 | publicly_accessible = false # Para que no sea accesible públicamente 46 | skip_final_snapshot = true 47 | vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.rds_sg.id] 48 | db_subnet_group_name = aws_db_subnet_group.main.name 49 | 50 | deletion_protection = true 51 | multi_az = true 52 | auto_minor_version_upgrade = true 53 | monitoring_interval = 60 54 | monitoring_role_arn = aws_iam_role.rds_monitoring_role.arn 55 | iam_database_authentication_enabled = true 56 | 57 | performance_insights_enabled = true 58 | performance_insights_retention_period = 90 59 | 60 | storage_encrypted = true 61 | 62 | enabled_cloudwatch_logs_exports = ["postgresql", "upgrade", "error", "slowquery"] 63 | 64 | backup_retention_period = 7 65 | copy_tags_to_snapshot = true 66 | 67 | tags = { 68 | Name = "healthy-db" 69 | } 70 | 71 | }

2 | resource "aws_security_group" "rds_sg" { 3 | name = "rds-security-group" 4 | description = "Permite acceso al puerto 5432 para PostgreSQL" 5 | vpc_id = aws_vpc.main.id 6 | 7 | ingress { 8 | from_port = 5432 9 | to_port = 5432 10 | protocol = "tcp" 11 | # Aquí permitimos acceso solo desde EC2 (seguro) 12 | security_groups = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id] 13 | } 14 | 15 | egress { 16 | from_port = 443 17 | to_port = 443 18 | protocol = "tcp" 19 | cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"] 20 | description = "Allow HTTPS outbound traffic" 21 | } 22 | 23 | 24 | tags = { 25 | Name = "rds-security-group" 26 | } 27 | }
